message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you, and this is a very competitive price.
I'm interested in the product, but $9,500 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your position, Bob, but $7,500 is significantly below its value.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $9,000. This is my final offer.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8,250. Can you consider that?
